mapper.select: INSERT INTO t_stream ( title, overview, category_id, user_id ) VALUES (#{title}, #{overview}, #{categoryId}, #{userId}) RETURNING stream_id

SELECT ts.stream_id, ts.title, mc.category_name, ts.entry_datetime FROM t_stream ts JOIN m_category mc ON ts.category_id = mc.category_id WHERE ts.user_id = #{userId} AND ts.delete_flag = FALSE AND mc.delete_flag = FALSE;

SELECT ts.stream_id, ts.title, ts.overview, ts.category_id, mc.category_name, ts.entry_datetime FROM t_stream ts JOIN m_category mc ON ts.category_id = mc.category_id WHERE ts.stream_id = #{streamId} AND ts.delete_flag = FALSE AND mc.delete_flag = FALSE;
mapper.update: UPDATE t_stream SET delete_flag = TRUE WHERE stream_id = #{streamId} AND delete_flag = FALSE
